message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 50% discount if you buy it now, so you can have it for $50. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long this product will be available at this price.
I'm not interested in buying the product at $50, even with the discount. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

I understand you're hesitant to buy at $50. I'll make you a new offer. I'll give you a 25% discount, and I'll throw in a 10-year warranty. The price is still $100, but I'll make sure you get a great deal. However, I want to remind you that this is a high-quality product, and you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I appreciate the warranty, but I'm still not interested in buying the product at full price. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

I understand you're being cautious. I want to be transparent with you - this product is not as high-quality as the previous ones. However, it's still a great value at $100, and I'm willing to make a one-time exception. I'll give you a full refund if you're not satisfied with the product after trying it out. This way, you can take a risk-free look at the product and see if it's something you'd like to keep.
I'm not interested in taking a risk on a potentially low-quality product, even with the refund offer. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

I'm not interested in taking a chance on a product with a 5% chance of getting a free second product. I'd like to see the product's actual quality before making a decision.

I'll let you inspect the product for 24 hours, and you can return it to me within that time frame if you're not satisfied. If you decide to keep it, the price remains $100. This way, you can get a feel for the product's quality before committing to a purchase.
